message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $15000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer! While I'm interested, $15000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Let's see if we can make this work.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $13500?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13500 is still a bit too high for me. Let's try $12500.  This is my final offer.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the product.
